amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities and Villages; Laws Applicable to More Than One and Less Than All Classes
amendatorysection.catchline: Vacant property registration ordinance; adoption by municipality.
amendatorysection.para: Under the Vacant Property Registration Act, a municipality may adopt a vacant property registration ordinance which applies to any type of either residential or commercial buildings or both, located within the corporate limits of the municipality, except that a vacant property registration ordinance shall not apply to property owned by the federal government, the State of Nebraska, or any political subdivision thereof. A vacant property registration ordinance shall create a city-wide vacant property registration data base and clearly designate a program administrator.
